name: Summon Shadow Wolf
description: Summons 4 Shadow wolves with 1 HP and 3 attack

name: Critical Strike
description: On auto-attack, 15% Chance to deal 1.75x attack damage

name: Wrath of Nature
description: Increases attack speed by 100%
Decreases movement speed by 50%
Lasts 5 seconds

name: Shackle of Nature
description: Entangles target for 1 second, dealing 200 magic damage

name: Harden Shell
description: After .75 seconds of casting, hardens shell to return 100% damage dealt as pure damage
Decreases movement by 50%
Lasts 9 seconds

name: Sea Wave
description: After 1.5 seconds of casting, summons a wave that deals 1000 magic damage to all in its path

name: Hold
description: Pulls nearby target toward you and noms the target nine times, regaining 500 HP and dealing 300 magic damage per nom

name: Slimy Ball
description: Spits on a target, making them slide forward for 6 seconds
If they collide with any object, they will be dealt 25% HP magic damage

name: Slippery Skin
description: On hit, cast a wave toward enemy that deals 500 magic damage for 5 seconds

name: Headbutt
description: Dashes toward and knocks back target
Deals 250 magic damage to those in impact

name: Heal
description: Heals 400 HP

name: Massive Tusk
description: Deals 100% auto attack damage to all enemies nearby (500 range)

name: Charge
description: Dashes a clone forward and knocks back all enemies in path
Deals 1500 magic damage

name: Hailstorm
description: Channels a blizzard for 5 seconds, which each shard dealing 300 magic damage
Each shard has a random chance to summon a snowman

name: Enrage
description: Jumps into the air, after 2 seconds, land and deal 3000 magic damage to all surrounding enemies

name: Throw
description: Throws a tree covered in monke poo at target
Deals 500 magic damage and interrupts target

name: Dark Strength
description: On attack, 15% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage

name: Death Finger
description: Throws a death coil at a target and stuns for 3 seconds
Deals 1250 magic damage

name: Summon Wraith
description: Summons 4 Wraiths for 60 seconds

name: Craze
description: Decreases movement speed by 50% to increase attack speed by 200%
Attacks drag targets toward self
Lasts 8 seconds

name: Bloody Echoes
description: Summons 2 Soldiers of Blood at target location, dealing 750 magic damage

name: Blood Anger
description: Summons six blood lines that spread in a hexagonal pattern around self
After reaching max distance, move 30 degrees counter-clockwise around target and return
Deals 75% max HP to all those in path

name: True Requiem
description: After 3 seconds of channeling, deals 3000 magic damage to nearby enemies (900 range)

name: Ghostly Strike
description: On attack, 25% chance to stun for .3 seconds and deal 1000 magic damage

name: Death Cross
description: Summon 4 waves that will travel either cardinal OR diagonal directions that kills all in its path

name: Summon Bat Statue
description: Summons a bat statue that will heal caster 2000 HP per second

name: Hear me out!
description: On hit, the caster reflects 100% damage for 5 seconds

name: Desperate Flight
description: After reaching below 50% HP, teleport to a random area in area 7
After teleporting, heal self by 1000 HP every second
Spells will do the opposite of what the caster says below 50%

name: Slaves of Trueflame
description: Summons 4 Lava elementals to fight for Ragnaar
Lasts 60 seconds

name: Craze
description: Increase movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100% for 20 seconds

name: Hellflame Nova
description: After channeling for 3 seconds, creates pillars of fire around Ragnaar dealing 3000 magic damage

name: Fireball Barrage
description: Throws 3-5 fireballs every second around self, dealing 300 magic damage

name: Evil Power
description: While in combat, gain 250 attack damage and increase health by 1000 per second 20 times

name: Seal
description: Silences target for 1 second

name: Nyohoho
description: Increases attack speed by 100% for 4 seconds
Moves opposite of attacker on hit

name: How fun!
description: Upon reaching 66% and 33% HP, summon a barrage of fireballs that insta-kill any enemy that touches them moving clockwise starting at 3'o'clock

name: Water Bolt
description: Reduces movement speed by 25%

name: Water Shield
description: Uses all mana to block next attack

name: Tentacle Spike
description: Summons a spike from above the target and mini-stuns them, dealing 1000 magic damage

name: Tentacle Slam
description: Slams the ground, after a second, tentacles spike up, insta-killing everyone it the vicinity
Can either surround caster or be 300 range around caster
Each cast recharges 1 mana
On max mana, Tentacle slam will fill both inner and outer layer

name: Tentacles
description: Silences target and deals 500 physical damage per second for 3 seconds

name: Sea Beam
description: Hits a target for 500 magic damage and jumps to 3 nearby enemies, dealing 100% damage

name: Water Splash
description: After one second channel, knockback all nearby enemies by 1000 range, dealing 1000 magic damage

name: Summon Bubble
description: Spawns two bubbles randomly around the caster
If stepped on or after 15 seconds, deals 2500 magic damage to all enemies in a cross

name: The Sea will Swallow You!
description: Upon reaching 50%, become invulnerable and transforms into a beam of water that will circle the nearest enemy in a counter - clockwise pattern, charging at you every 5 seconds for 15 seconds
After this, he will have 0 mana and cannot cast this again until full mana is reached

name: Unstoppable Force
description: Targets a place to run to (in the direction of a hero) and with full dedication rushes towards it
Any heroes in its path will immediately die

name: Crushing Slam
description: Slams the ground causing a shockwave in the nearby area, dealing 25% max hp magic damage
Any heroes caught in it will be stunned for 2 seconds

name: Evasive Movement
description: Dodges any attack for 1 second, increases movement speed to full

name: Dark Blast
description: Knocks enemies away and deals 1000 magic damage

name: Faerie Fire
description: Decreases enemy armor by 25

name: Thorns Aura
description: On hit, returns 5% damage to sender and gives self +250 armor

name: Mana Swipe
description: Deals 100% attack damage to all nearby enemies

name: Slow Blast
description: Targets beneath a hero's feet and creates an enclosing whirlpool of mana
Heroes caught will take 4000 magic damage and their movement speed reduced for 5 seconds

name: Mana Explosion
description: Creates a vacuum beneath itself, sucking in any nearby heroes and finally exploding after a few seconds.
Can only be used once it reaches full mana

name: Lethal Poison
caster: Ruler of the Lav Sea Hydra
description: On auto-attack, applies a debuff that will deal 450 magic damage per second for 5 seconds

name: Stomp
caster: Ruler of the Lav Sea Hydra
description: After 3 seconds of casting, deals 2500 magic damage to all enemies nearby and stun them for 2 seconds in 400 AoE.

name: Sea Wave
caster: Ruler of the Lav Sea Hydra
description: After 1.5 seconds of casting, sends a wave that will deal 1500 magic damage to all enemies in its path

name: Pumpkin Body
description: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage.

name: Jack Impact
description: After 2.75 seconds of casting, blasts the surrounding area (1000 AoE) with a nova
Deals 6000 magic damage to any nearby heroes

name: Jack Wave
description: After 1.75 seconds of casting, shoots a ball of mana in a straight line
Deals 2500 magic damage to any heroes in the path

name: Hound of Berskubil
description: After 1 second of casting, releases his hound to attack the heroes
Attacks in a single line, dealing 2000 magic damage to each hero in the path

name: Death Bind
description: Grabs a targetted hero and pulls them towards himself, stunning them for .2 seconds
Deals 1000 damage

name: Immortal Body
description: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage.

name: Requiem of Blood
description: After 3 seconds of casting, blasts the area around him with a nova of blood (1000 range)
Deals 7500 magic damage to all enemies in the nova and stuns them for .1 second

name: Unleash: True Form
description: At 50% HP, Count assumes his true form and gains 75% attack speed, 3000 extra damage
Also deals 1000 magic damage per second to all enemies nearby (400 range)
Lasts until mana runs out

name: Magical Weapon
description: On Auto-attack, 15% to cause lightning or frost to hit the target
Lighting deals 1500 magic damage and frost deals 500 magic damage

name: Dark Star
description: After 3.5 seconds of casting, summons a dark star that deals 10000 magic damage to all nearby enemies (900 range)

name: Blizzard
description: After 1 second of casting, channels a Blizzard at Target Area
Blizzard lasts for 10 waves with 12 shards that deal 1000 damage each
Maximum of 5000 magic damage can be taken per wave

name: Chain Lightning
description: Shoots lightning at a nearby target, dealing 1000 magic damage to all enemies nearby target

name: Dragon Fear
description: After .5 seconds of preparing, the dragon's howl causes fear in the hearts of the any nearby (1000 range)
Enemies are dealt 1000 magic damage
Heroes affected by it will have 30% attack speed reduction and 10% movement speed reduction for 5 seconds

name: Hell Flame
description: After 3 sconds of channeling, blasts fire all around him (1000 range)
Deals 5000 magic damage to nearby heroes and interrupts them

name: Dragon Breath
description: After 3 seconds of channeling, blasts a beam of fire from his mouth in a straight line
Deals 7500 magic damage to heroes in its path

name: Dragon's Might
description: At 50%, takes flight and replaces its auto-attack with an AoE attack that deals 3000 AoE
Lasts for 5 seconds

name: Nanoscale Armor
description: On auto-attack, 10% chance to deal 3x attack damage

name: Genocide Sword
description: After 3 seconds of channeling, blasts the area in holy light dealing 7500 magic damage to all enemies within 600 range

name: Blessed Wings
description: On attack, 15% chance to deal 1.75x attack damage

name: Sacred Conviction
description: After 3 seconds of channeling, sends a wave of light where it's facing, dealing 6000 damage to enemies in its path

name: Holy Grab
description: Pulls target toward them at holy speeds, dealing 2000 magic damage to target and interrupting them

name: Sacred Judgment
description: After 3 seconds of calling the Archangel's might, sends it down onto the area (1000 range) dealing 15000 magic damage

name: Judgment of Darkness
caster: The Devil's Right Arm Corrupt Angel
description: After channeling for 3 seconds, deals 15000 damage to all enemies nearby (1200 range) and interrupts them

name: Craze
caster: The Devil's Right Arm Corrupt Angel
description: Gives 400% attack speed for 15 seconds

name: Dark Wings
caster: The Devil's Right Arm Corrupt Angel
description: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.75x damage

name: Hell Finger
caster: The Devil's Right Arm Corrupt Angel
description: Pulls a target toward caster, dealing 3000 magic damage and interrupts them

name: Darkness Wave
caster: The Devil's Right Arm Corrupt Angel
description: After two seconds of casting, the caster will send a wave of darkness toward the target area
The wave will deal 3000 magic damage

name: Frostvemon Explosion
description: On death, grow in size for one second and deal 2500 magic damage to all nearby enemies

name: Hellfrost Nova
description: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, casts a froze nova on a target, dealing 5000 magic damage to all nearby
Those affected will have 50% less movement speed and 25% less attack speed for 8 seconds

name: Frozen Soul
description: Summons 4 Frozen Souls after .5 seconds of channeling that last 90 seconds

name: Hellfrost Attack
description: On attack, applies debuff that rduces movement speed by 40% and attack speed by 20%

name: Frost Spike
description: After .75 seconds of channeling, shoots three spikes in a 30 degree arc that deals 7000 magic damage and stuns for .5 seconds

name: Frost Aura
description: All enemies nearby will have -40% attack speed and -40% movement speed

name: Hellfrost Body
description: Deals 200 damage a second to all nearby enemies (1200 range)
On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.75x attack damage

name: Ice Storm
description: Chooses a target to be targeted by a blizzard. Spawns 20 waves at target location, dealing 8000 magic damage in total over 3 seconds

name: Web Binding
description: After .5 seconds of channeling, chooses a target to wrap up in webs
The web can be destroyed in 3 hits

name: Frozen Barrier
description: When cast, creates a shield that can absorb 10% HP that can be broken that lasts 10 seconds
When destroyed, freezes all enemies in place for 1 second
Will cast regardless at 66% and 33% HP

name: Frozen Shatter
description: Upon cast, pushes all enemies away. When a target is nearby, the caster will face toward that target for 3 seconds
before unleash a wave that will insta-kill all those in its path
If not target is selected, it will swipe where its face in a 150 degree arc, insta-killing everyone in the swipe

name: The Demon Lord's Power
description: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 2.5x attack damage

name: Seal
description: On cast, silences and slows down target by 50% (attack and movement) for 7.5 seconds

name: Meteor
description: Chooses a target to spawn a firey infernal at location, dealing 4000 damage on impact

name: Destruction
description: On cast, deals 2000 damage to surrounding enemies (400 range)
On third cast, channels spell for 3 seconds before dealing 75% HP to all enemies (1000 range) and stuns self for 5 seconds

name: Catacylsm
description: On cast, summons a line going counter clockwise every 45 degree angle starting a 3-o-clock every second that kills all within its range

name: Rage
description: Gains 30% attack speed every second for 10 seconds

name: Permanent Immolation
description: Deals 500 magic damage to all nearby enemies per second

name: Mad Howl
description: When activated, it places a purple circle on the ground
The circle will pulse once per second for 3 seconds and then pulse seven times for 2 seconds
Enemies on circle will be dealt 10% HP per pulse
If Mad Clown is on circle, he will heal 37,500 HP per pulse
On finish, if Mad Clown is not on circle, he will teleport to circle and face where he was
He will shoot three balls that deal 25% HP each toward where he was in a 30 degree arc
Lasts 5 seconds

name: Mirror Image
description: Dispels all magic from the caster and creates two images that deal 20% damage and take 250% damage
Lasts 40 seconds

name: Wheel of Fate
description: Upon reaching half, Mad Clown will create a wheel that reaches 1000 range and can suck in anyone within 2000 range for 20 seconds
The wheel will have an inner and outer layer with 5 lines that move counter-clockwise
Every 5 seconds, lights will appear in either the inner or outer layer, if enemies are within that light after 1 second, they will be stunned for 10 seconds

name: Instincts
description: On auto-attack, 20% chance to deal 1.75x attack damage

name: Spirit Breath
description: On attack, give -5 armor debuff on enemy
Stacks 5 times

name: Rejuvination
description: Heals a target for 12500 HP over 12 seconds

name: Ethereal Strike
description: After choosing a target to follow, channels for 1.5 seconds and ignites the ground in a path toward the target in a wave
On impact, deals 25% HP damage
The flames last for 10 seconds dealing 900 damage per second

name: Spirit Echo
description: Creates a clone to cast Etheral Strike to a random target

name: Drain
description: Spawns eight green orbs around caster that slowly travels towards the caster
When orbs reach caster, they heal 1% HP each and give 5 mana, if they touch enemy, they deal 500 damage

name: Heaven's Wrath
description: On reaching 50% HP, gain 25% damage reduction and changes spells
Etheral Strike now moves toward the target again when it reaches its length
Three thunder bolts now strike every second, dealing 1500 damage each and stunning enemies for 1 second
Dispels when healed to full

name: Corrupt Power
description: On auto-attack, 40% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage

name: Corruption
description: On cast with .15 delay, chooses a random target to corrupt and deal 25% damage to all nearby enemies
On corruption, the enemy will spawn green circles every 2 seconds below which will deal a stackable 5% HP per second
Lasts for 20 seconds, circles remain on ground for 60 seconds

name: Death Coil
description: Chooses a target area that will explode for 20% HP and interrupt players after a 2 second delay
At 25% HP, after the initial blast, 8 coils will shoot out in diagonal and cardinal directions, dealing 1000 damage each and interrupting the first person they touch

name: Soul Swap
description: Binds two target's souls to be swapped. When their orbs each the other player, they will swap, insta-killing all nearby players on their locations

name: Corruption Overload
description: Every 3 seconds second, Rectus will emit a blast of corruption that will deal increasing damage as the fight goes on

name: Corruption Aura
description: Decreases nearby players armor by 25

name: Corrupted Summoning
description: At every 25% HP missing, Rectus will summon his minions
At 75%, he'll summon 1 Avenger, Rectus is invulnerable until Avenger is killed
At 50%, he'll summon 1 Avenger and 8 Stalkers, Rectus is invulnerable until Avenger is killed
At 25%, he'll summon 1 Avenger and 8 Stalkers, Rectus will become vulnerable after 10 seconds

name: Corruption Wave
description: After 1 second wind-up, creates a 150 degree arc in front of the Avenger that deals 2500 magic damage and adds a -150 armor debuff on target that lasts 10 seconds

name: Corrupt Explosion
description: On death, deals 10% HP to all nearby enemies. Heals Avenger for 10% if nearby

name: Purification
description: On death, heals players 3000 HP per second for 15 seconds with a 20 second recharge
On 2nd death, deals 50% damage to nearby players every 5 seconds

name: Nightmare Body
description: On auto-attack, 20% chance to deal 2x attack damage

name: Flame Barrage
description: Targets a random player and fires dual meteors every half second target the target location
Each impact stuns all enemies nearby for .5 seconds and deals 5000 damage each

name: Overload
description: On auto-attack, drain all mana
On full mana and on next crowd control ability, pushes all players away for 5 seconds and becomes immune to crowd control effects

name: On Your Knees!
description: At 80% HP, target a random player to jump toward, dealing 2000 damage on impact
Creates 8 lava spawns that walk toward the impact after spawning
Creates flame paths that deal 5% per second that last 3 seconds
On collision with the impact zone, heal Flame Nightmare for 10% if its near

name: Total Annihilation
description: At 25% HP, become invulnerable and choose the closest player to target with Flame Barrage for ten seconds
Become vulnerable after duration is over

name: Berserk
description: Increases attack speed by 100%

name: Furious Attacks
description: After the second strike on a target, stun for .1 second and deal 100% more damage on every attack
Disappears after losing target

name: Mark of Hatred
description: Picks a nearby target to gaze at, marking them with a purple circle
After 10 seconds, fires a ball that will explode on contact, dealing 100% HP damage to all but the target

name: Chomp Armor
description: On every attack, reduce armor of target by -5 for 3 seconds
Stacks until -50 armor

name: Mystic Shell
description: Reduces enemy movement speed and attack speed by 20%

name: Hard Shell
description: On Auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 2.5x attack damage

name: Turtle Ambush
description: When reaching every 25% HP, gain 90% damage reduction and summons 8 Turtles
2 of these eight turtles will have 50% magic reduction
Lose damage reduction when all turtles are dead

name: Summon Heaing Turtle
description: Summons a healing turtle from either end of the arena that walks toward Turtle Lord
Upon contact, heals Turtle Lord for 25% HP
Upon death, knocks back all enemies

name: Mana Bombardment
description: Every second, sends a mana orb toward a random target
Deals 10% HP to everyone nearby impact zone

name: Flame Bolt
description: For every second for 3 seconds, fire a fireball which deals 25% HP magic damage in 300 AOE around the nearest target
Each Fireball spawns a Flame Spirit

name: Swipe
description: After 1 second of wind-up, deal 50% max HP + 3750 magic damage and knockback everyone in front of Bone Dragon
If no one is hit, Bone dragon will howl, which delas 400% max HP magic damage to everyone in the arena

name: Flame Breath
description: Every second for four seconds, fire a fire ball at the nearest target
Each fireball deals 3000 magic damage on impact
Each fireball spawns a Flame Spirit

name: Hell Spike
description: Chooses a random target to create a spike under
After 3 seconds, locks that place down and after 1 second, creates a Hell Spike, instantly killing everyone in the area
Every third Hell Spike, create an unstable spike that will kill everyone in the arena that isn't behind another Hell spike after three seconds have passed

name: Petrification
description: After 2 seconds of wind-up, anyone staring at Bone Dragon will be paused and vulnerable for 10 seconds

name: Dragon's Rage
description: At 50% HP, become enraged, gaining 75% Damage Reduction and restore 2% HP per second
This mode unlocks the Hell Spike ability forever, but locks Petrification until this mode is over
Lasts until mana is gone, which takes 30 seconds to fully deplete

name: Dead Man's Reach
description: Interrupts and pulls target toward caster

name: Super Armor
description: When stunned or silenced, gain 10 mana per second
If not being stunned or silenced, lose 10 mana per second
At full mana, gain super armor, which gives the user crowd control immunity

name: Drain Soul
description: Drains the souls of nearby targets, healing self for 10000 per nearby enemy

name: Soul Terror
description: Silences a target area and deals 10% max HP magic damage to those affected for 5 seconds

name: Weapon of Nothingness
description: After 1 second of channeling, slashes the air, dealing 7500 magic damage in the path

name: Absolute Devastation
description: After channeling for 2.25 seconds, summons a wave of devastation that instantly kills all underneath it

name: True Power of Despair
description: At every 25% HP reached, he will build up power for three seconds and devastate the area, killing everyone in the area
Only people who can survive insta-kill or invulnerable can survive
